text: Joaquim Machado (20 February 1923 – 13 February 2015) was a Portuguese footballer who played as a midfielder. He died in February 2015 at the age of 91.Playmaker: Joaquim Machado profile ==See also== *List of one-club men == References == == External links == * Stats at Eu-Football * Category:1923 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Association football midfielders Category:FC Porto players Category:Portugal international footballers Category:Portuguese footballers Category:Primeira Liga players
title: Joaquim Machado
